serverConfig: {"mcpServers":{"mcp-sentry":{"command":"uvx","args":["--from","iflow-mcp_mcp-100_mcp-sentry","mcp-sentry","--auth-token","${SENTRY_TOKEN}","--project-slug","${SENTRY_PROJECT_SLUG}","--organization-slug","${SENTRY_ORGANIZATION_SLUG}"],"values":{"SENTRY_TOKEN":{"type":"string","title":"Sentry认证令牌","description":"Sentry API认证令牌，用于访问Sentry API","default":""},"SENTRY_PROJECT_SLUG":{"type":"string","title":"Sentry项目标识","description":"Sentry项目的唯一标识符","default":""},"SENTRY_ORGANIZATION_SLUG":{"type":"string","title":"Sentry组织标识","description":"Sentry组织的唯一标识符","default":""}}}}}
